blocks.name: nnind
blocks.content: Principle of Mathematical Induction (inference schema). The first four hypotheses give us the substitution instances we need; the last two are the basis and the induction step. See ~ nnaddcl for an example of its use. See ~ nn0ind for induction on nonnegative integers and ~ uzind , ~ uzind4 for induction on an arbitrary upper set of integers. See ~ indstr for strong induction. See also ~ nnindALT . This is an alternative for Metamath 100 proof #74. (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-1997.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jun-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnind(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), nat1), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)), wb(w1, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| w2
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s1), cn), wi(w3, w4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  simprd(wcel(c0, cn), w0, wcel(c0, cn))
  sylib(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(c0, cn), w0), wcel(c0, crab(s0, cn, w1)))
  sseli(c0, cn, crab(s0, cn, w1))
  mp2an(wss(cn, crab(s0, cn, w1)), wcel(nat1, crab(s0, cn, w1)), wral(s1, crab(s0, cn, w1), wcel(co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), crab(s0, cn, w1))))
  mpbir2an(wcel(nat1, crab(s0, cn, w1)), wcel(nat1, cn), w2)
  1nn()
  elrab(s0, nat1, cn, w1, w2)
  rgen(s1, crab(s0, cn, w1), wcel(co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), crab(s0, cn, w1)))
  mpcom(wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, cn, w1)), wcel(co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), crab(s0, cn, w1)), wcel(cv(s1), cn))
  elrabi(s0, cv(s1), cn, w1)
  3imtr4g(wcel(cv(s1), cn), wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, cn, w1)), wcel(co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), crab(s0, cn, w1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cn), w3), wa(wcel(co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), cn), w4))
  anim12d(wcel(cv(s1), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cn), w3, wcel(co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), cn), w4)
  a1d(wcel(cv(s1), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cn), wcel(co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), cn))
  peano2nn(cv(s1))
  elrab(s0, cv(s1), cn, w1, w3)
  elrab(s0, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), cn, w1, w4)
  peano5nni(s1, crab(s0, cn, w1))
  elrab(s0, c0, cn, w1, w0)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(s1), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, cn, w1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cn.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nnind(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ → w0)
  ⊣ (s0 = 1 →(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w1 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s0 =(s1[+]1)→(w1 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ w2
  ⊣ (s1 ∈ ℕ →(w3 → w4))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w4)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  simprd(c0 ∈ ℕ, w0, c0 ∈ ℕ)
  sylib(c0 ∈ ℕ, (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ w0), c0 ∈ { s0 ∈ ℕ | w1 })
  sseli(c0, cn, { s0 ∈ ℕ | w1 })
  mp2an(ℕ ⊆ { s0 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, 1 ∈ { s0 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, ∀(s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ ℕ | w1 },(s1[+]1)∈ { s0 ∈ ℕ | w1 }))
  mpbir2an(1 ∈ { s0 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, 1 ∈ ℕ, w2)
  1nn()
  elrab(s0, nat1, cn, w1, w2)
  rgen(s1, { s0 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, (s1[+]1)∈ { s0 ∈ ℕ | w1 })
  mpcom(s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, (s1[+]1)∈ { s0 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, s1 ∈ ℕ)
  elrabi(s0, s1, cn, w1)
  3imtr4g(s1 ∈ ℕ, s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, (s1[+]1)∈ { s0 ∈ ℕ | w1 }, (s1 ∈ ℕ ∧ w3), ((s1[+]1)∈ ℕ ∧ w4))
  anim12d(s1 ∈ ℕ, s1 ∈ ℕ, w3, (s1[+]1)∈ ℕ, w4)
  a1d(s1 ∈ ℕ, s1 ∈ ℕ, (s1[+]1)∈ ℕ)
  peano2nn(s1)
  elrab(s0, s1, cn, w1, w3)
  elrab(s0, (s1[+]1), cn, w1, w4)
  peano5nni(s1, { s0 ∈ ℕ | w1 })
  elrab(s0, c0, cn, w1, w0)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, s1, caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, cn, w1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cn.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: nnindALT
blocks.content: Principle of Mathematical Induction (inference schema). The last four hypotheses give us the substitution instances we need; the first two are the induction step and the basis. This ALT version of ~ nnind has a different hypothesis order. It may be easier to use with the Metamath program Proof Assistant, because "MM-PA> ASSIGN LAST" will be applied to the substitution instances first. We may eventually use this one as the official version. You may use either version. After the proof is complete, the ALT version can be changed to the non-ALT version with "MM-PA> MINIMIZE_WITH nnind / MAY_GROW". (Contributed by NM, 7-Dec-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnindALT(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), w0)
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wi(w1, w2))
  -| w3
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wb(w4, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w4, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wb(w4, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wb(w4, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w3)
} = {
  nnind(s1, s0, c0, w0, w4, w3, w1, w2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nnindALT(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ → w0)
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ ℕ →(w1 → w2))
  ⊣ w3
  ⊣ (s1 = 1 →(w4 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s1 = s0 →(w4 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (s1 =(s0[+]1)→(w4 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s1 = c0 →(w4 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w4)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w2)
  ⊣ d(s1, w3)
} = {
  nnind(s1, s0, c0, w0, w4, w3, w1, w2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: nn1m1nn
blocks.content: Every positive integer is one or a successor. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn1m1nn(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cn)))
} = {
  nnind(hs0, hs1, c0, wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cn)), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), cn)), wcel(nat1, cc), wo(wceq(cv(hs1), nat1), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cmin, nat1), cn)), wo(wceq(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), nat1), wcel(co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cn)))
  2thd(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), cn)), wcel(nat1, cc))
  orc(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), cn))
  1cnd(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))
  orbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), cn), wceq(cv(hs1), nat1), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cmin, nat1), cn))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), nat1)
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), cn, co(cv(hs1), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cmin, nat1)
  orbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), cn), wceq(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), nat1), wcel(co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cn))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), nat1)
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), cn, co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1)
  orbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), cn), wceq(c0, nat1), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cn))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, nat1)
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), cn, co(c0, cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cmin, nat1)
  a1d(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wo(wceq(cv(hs1), nat1), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cmin, nat1), cn)), wo(wceq(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), nat1), wcel(co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cn)))
  olcd(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wceq(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), nat1), wcel(co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cn))
  eqeltrd(co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cn, cv(hs1), wcel(cv(hs1), cn))
  sylancl(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wceq(co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wcel(nat1, cc))
  nncn(cv(hs1))
  ax-1cn()
  pncan(cv(hs1), nat1)
  id(wcel(cv(hs1), cn))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wo(wceq(c0, nat1), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cn)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(nat1, cc))
  diff.hs0.w(wo(wceq(cv(hs1), nat1), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cmin, nat1), cn)))
  diff.hs0.w(wo(wceq(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), nat1), wcel(co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cn)))
  diff.hs1.w(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), cn)))
}

blocks.name: nn1suc
blocks.content: If a statement holds for 1 and also holds for a successor, it holds for all positive integers. The first three hypotheses give us the substitution instances we need; the last two show that it holds for 1 and for a successor. (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn1suc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), nat1), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| w2
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s1), cn), w3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  mpjaod(wcel(c0, cn), w0, wceq(c0, nat1), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cn))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wi(wceq(c0, nat1), w0))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, nat1), w0, wsbc(s0, nat1, w1))
  mpbir(wsbc(s0, nat1, w1), w2)
  sbcie(s0, nat1, w1, w2)
  1ex()
  bitr3d(wceq(c0, nat1), w0, wsbc(s0, nat1, w1), wsbc(s0, c0, w1))
  syl(wceq(c0, nat1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w1), w0), wcel(c0, cn))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, nat1), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(nat1, cn))
  1nn()
  eleq1(c0, nat1, cn)
  dfsbcq(s0, c0, nat1, w1)
  syl5ib(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cn), w0, wsbc(s0, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), w1))
  vtoclga(s1, co(c0, cmin, nat1), cn, wsbc(s0, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), w1), w3)
  syl5bbr(wceq(cv(s1), co(c0, cmin, nat1)), w3, wsbc(s0, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), w1), wsbc(s0, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), w1))
  sbcie(s0, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), w1, w3)
  ovex(cv(s1), caddc, nat1)
  sbceq1d(s0, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), wceq(cv(s1), co(c0, cmin, nat1)), w1)
  oveq1(cv(s1), co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1)
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cn), wsbc(s0, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), w1), w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w1))
  sbceq1d(s0, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), c0, wcel(c0, cn), w1)
  sylancl(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), c0), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, cc))
  nncn(c0)
  ax-1cn()
  npcan(c0, nat1)
  sbcieg(s0, c0, cn, w1, w0)
  nn1m1nn(c0)
  diff.cn.s(s1)
  diff.wsbc.s(s1, s0, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), w1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cmin, nat1)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(s1), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nn1suc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ → w0)
  ⊣ (s0 = 1 →(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s0 =(s1[+]1)→(w1 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ w2
  ⊣ (s1 ∈ ℕ → w3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w3)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  mpjaod(c0 ∈ ℕ, w0, c0 = 1, (c0[-]1)∈ ℕ)
  a1i(c0 ∈ ℕ, (c0 = 1 → w0))
  mpbiri(c0 = 1, w0, [1 / s0]w1)
  mpbir([1 / s0]w1, w2)
  sbcie(s0, nat1, w1, w2)
  1ex()
  bitr3d(c0 = 1, w0, [1 / s0]w1, [c0 / s0]w1)
  syl(c0 = 1, ([c0 / s0]w1 ↔ w0), c0 ∈ ℕ)
  mpbiri(c0 = 1, c0 ∈ ℕ, 1 ∈ ℕ)
  1nn()
  eleq1(c0, nat1, cn)
  dfsbcq(s0, c0, nat1, w1)
  syl5ib(c0 ∈ ℕ, (c0[-]1)∈ ℕ, w0, [((c0[-]1)[+]1)/ s0]w1)
  vtoclga(s1, (c0[-]1), cn, [((c0[-]1)[+]1)/ s0]w1, w3)
  syl5bbr(s1 =(c0[-]1), w3, [((c0[-]1)[+]1)/ s0]w1, [(s1[+]1)/ s0]w1)
  sbcie(s0, (s1[+]1), w1, w3)
  ovex(s1, caddc, nat1)
  sbceq1d(s0, (s1[+]1), ((c0[-]1)[+]1), s1 =(c0[-]1), w1)
  oveq1(s1, (c0[-]1), caddc, nat1)
  bitrd(c0 ∈ ℕ, [((c0[-]1)[+]1)/ s0]w1, w0, [c0 / s0]w1)
  sbceq1d(s0, ((c0[-]1)[+]1), c0, c0 ∈ ℕ, w1)
  sylancl(c0 ∈ ℕ, ((c0[-]1)[+]1)= c0, c0 ∈ ℂ, 1 ∈ ℂ)
  nncn(c0)
  ax-1cn()
  npcan(c0, nat1)
  sbcieg(s0, c0, cn, w1, w0)
  nn1m1nn(c0)
  diff.cn.s(s1)
  diff.wsbc.s(s1, s0, ((c0[-]1)[+]1), w1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, (c0[-]1), caddc, nat1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cmin, nat1)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, s1, caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: nnaddcl
blocks.content: Closure of addition of positive integers, proved by induction on the second addend. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-1997.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnaddcl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cn))
} = {
  impcom(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cn))
  nnind(hs0, hs1, c1, wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cn)), wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), cn)), wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cn)), wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs1)), cn)), wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cn))
  eleq1d(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), cn, co(c0, caddc, nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), nat1, c0, caddc)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs1)), cn))
  eleq1d(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), cn, co(c0, caddc, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, caddc)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn))
  eleq1d(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), cn, co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c0, caddc)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cn))
  eleq1d(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), cn, co(c0, caddc, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, caddc)
  peano2nn(c0)
  a2d(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs1)), cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn))
  expcom(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(c0, cn), wi(wcel(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs1)), cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn)))
  syl5ib(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs1)), cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat1), cn))
  peano2nn(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs1)))
  eleq1d(co(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat1), cn, co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat1), co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc))
  nncn(c0)
  nncn(cv(hs1))
  mp3an3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs1)), caddc, nat1), co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ax-1cn()
  addass(c0, cv(hs1), nat1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cn)))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cn)))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs1)), cn)))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn)))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), cn)))

blocks.name: nnmulcl
blocks.content: Closure of multiplication of positive integers. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-1997.) Remove dependency on ~ ax-mulcom and ~ ax-mulass . (Revised by Steven Nguyen, 24-Sep-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnmulcl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn))
} = {
  impcom(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn))
  nnind(hs0, hs1, c1, wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn)), wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn)), wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, nat1), cn)), wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), cn)), wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, nat1), cn))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn, co(c0, cmul, nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), nat1, c0, cmul)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), cn))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, cmul)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c0, cmul)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn, co(c0, cmul, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cmul)
  mpcom(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, nat1), cn), wcel(c0, cr))
  biimprd(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, nat1), cn))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cmul, nat1), cn, c0, wcel(c0, cr))
  a2d(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn))
  pm2.43b(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(c0, cn), wi(wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn)))
  exp4b(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn))
  syl5ibr(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), cn)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, c0), cn))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), cn), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, c0), cn))
  nnaddcl(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), c0)
  eleq1d(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn, co(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)))
  eqtrd(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, co(c0, cmul, nat1)), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, co(c0, cmul, nat1))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc))
  nncn(c0)
  nncn(cv(hs1))
  mp3an3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, co(c0, cmul, nat1))), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ax-1cn()
  adddi(c0, cv(hs1), nat1)
  oveq2d(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, co(c0, cmul, nat1), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wceq(co(c0, cmul, nat1), c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(c0, cmul, nat1), c0), wcel(c0, cr))
  nnre(c0)
  ax-1rid(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn)))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, nat1), cn)))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), cn)))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn)))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn)))
}

blocks.content: Obsolete version of ~ nnmulcl as of 24-Sep-2022. Closure of multiplication of positive integers. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-1997.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm nnmulclOLD(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn))
} = {
  impcom(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn))
  nnind(hs0, hs1, c1, wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn)), wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn)), wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, nat1), cn)), wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), cn)), wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, nat1), cn))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn, co(c0, cmul, nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), nat1, c0, cmul)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), cn))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, cmul)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c0, cmul)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn, co(c0, cmul, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cmul)
  mpcom(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, nat1), cn), wcel(c0, cc))
  biimprd(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, nat1), cn))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cmul, nat1), cn, c0, wcel(c0, cc))
  a2d(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn))
  pm2.43b(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(c0, cn), wi(wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn)))
  exp4b(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn))
  syl5ibr(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), cn)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, c0), cn))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), cn), wcel(co(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, c0), cn))
  nnaddcl(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), c0)
  eleq1d(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn, co(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, c0)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc))
  nncn(c0)
  nncn(cv(hs1))
  eqtrd(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, co(c0, cmul, nat1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)))
  mp3an3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, co(c0, cmul, nat1))), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ax-1cn()
  adddi(c0, cv(hs1), nat1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, co(c0, cmul, nat1)), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, c0)))
  oveq2d(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, co(c0, cmul, nat1), c0, wcel(c0, cc))
  mulid1(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cn)))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, nat1), cn)))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), cn)))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn)))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), cn)))
}

blocks.name: nnmulcli
blocks.content: Closure of multiplication of positive integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Feb-2014.)

blocks.name: nnmtmip
blocks.content: "Minus times minus is plus, The reason for this we need not discuss." (W. H. Auden, as quoted in M. Guillen "Bridges to Infinity", p. 64, see also Metamath Book, section 1.1.1, p. 5) This statement, formalized to "The product of two negative integers is a positive integer", is proved by the following theorem, therefore it actually need not be discussed anymore. "The reason for this" is that ` ( -u A x. -u B ) = ( A x. B ) ` for all complex numbers ` A ` and ` B ` because of ~ mul2neg , ` A ` and ` B ` are complex numbers because of ~ nncn , and ` ( A x. B ) e. NN ` because of ~ nnmulcl . This also holds for positive reals, see ~ rpmtmip . Note that the opposites ` -u A ` and ` -u B ` of the positive integers ` A ` and ` B ` are negative integers. (Contributed by AV, 23-Dec-2022.)

blocks.name: nn2ge
blocks.content: There exists a positive integer greater than or equal to any two others. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-1999.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn2ge(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wrex(s0, cn, wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  lecasei(c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wrex(s0, cn, wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c0, cr))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c1, cr))
  adantll(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wrex(s0, cn, wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))))
  syldan(wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wrex(s0, cn, wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c1)))
  sylan(wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c1)), wcel(c1, cr))
  nnre(c1)
  anim1ci(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c1))
  leid(c1)
  rspcev(s0, c1, cn, wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c1)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c1))
  breq2(cv(s0), c1, c0, cle)
  breq2(cv(s0), c1, c1, cle)
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wrex(s0, cn, wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wrex(s0, cn, wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wcel(c0, cr))
  nnre(c0)
  anim1i(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c0))
  leid(c0)
  rspcev(s0, c0, cn, wa(wbr(c0, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  breq2(cv(s0), c0, c0, cle)
  breq2(cv(s0), c0, c1, cle)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c1))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cle, c1)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c1, cle, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wbr(c0, cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cle, c0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c1, cle, c0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nn2ge(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ)→ ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ,(c0[≤]s0 ∧ c1[≤]s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  lecasei(c0, c1, (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ), ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ,(c0[≤]s0 ∧ c1[≤]s0)))
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℕ, c0 ∈ ℝ)
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  adantll(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℕ, c0[≤]c1, ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ,(c0[≤]s0 ∧ c1[≤]s0)))
  syldan(c1 ∈ ℕ, c0[≤]c1, ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ,(c0[≤]s0 ∧ c1[≤]s0)), (c0[≤]c1 ∧ c1[≤]c1))
  sylan(c1 ∈ ℕ, c0[≤]c1, (c0[≤]c1 ∧ c1[≤]c1), c1 ∈ ℝ)
  nnre(c1)
  anim1ci(c1 ∈ ℝ, c0[≤]c1, c1[≤]c1)
  leid(c1)
  rspcev(s0, c1, cn, (c0[≤]c1 ∧ c1[≤]c1), (c0[≤]s0 ∧ c1[≤]s0))
  anbi12d(s0 = c1, c0[≤]s0, c1[≤]s0, c0[≤]c1, c1[≤]c1)
  breq2(s0, c1, c0, cle)
  breq2(s0, c1, c1, cle)
